title: SlackPirate Set Sails Again! Or: How to Send the Entire “Bee Movie” Script to Your Friends in Slack
summary: TLDR: SlackPirate has been defunct for a few years due to a breaking change in how the Slack client interacts with the Slack API.

title: DeepSeek Jailbreak Reveals Its Entire System Prompt
summary: Now we know exactly how DeepSeek was designed to work, and we may even have a clue toward its highly publicized scandal with OpenAI.

title: Black Hat USA 2024 Highlights
summary: Check out all the highlights from Black Hat USA 2024 at the Mandalay Bay in Las Vegas.

title: Community Health Center Data Breach Affects 1M Patients
summary: The CHC remains operational, but a host of personal data is now in the hands of a "skilled cybercriminal," it said.

title: DoJ Shutters Cybercrime Forums Behind Attacks on 17M Americans
summary: The "Cracked" and "Nulled" Dark Web sites are now offline, along with the Pakistani "Saim Raza" network of underground forums (aka HeartSender).

title: State Data Privacy Regulators Are Coming. What Story Will You Tell Them?
summary: Regulators are ready to enforce new state data privacy laws.

title: Tenable to Acquire Vulcan Cyber to Boost Exposure Management Focus
summary: The deal, expected to close this quarter, will give Tenable One Exposure Management much-needed integration with over 100 third-party security tools and platforms.

title: Code-Scanning Tool's License at Heart of Security Breakup
summary: Nine application security toolmakers band together to fork the popular Semgrep code-scanning project, touching off a controversy over access to features and fairness.

title: Can AI & the Cyber Trust Mark Rebuild Endpoint Confidence?
summary: The Cyber Trust Mark has the potential to change how we define and measure security at the endpoint level.

title: Become an elite Red Teamer with HTB Pro Labs (and get a free t-shirt!)
summary: Get one of our most popular swag items when you purchase an annual Pro Labs subscription.
